HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Call of Duty: Zombies Pack has been updated to Version 1.5 |Big News! Halituis Amaricanous's Retexture is live and is beautifully made and should be checked out! Athena Framework has been made a requirement for the mod.
Mystery Box and Der Wunderfizz now have using Effects. (No mod support) Rayguns and Wunderwaffe's attacks look more like lasers Thunder guns now properly AOE weapons. Raygun V is no longer Biotech locked. Shotgun like Weapons now have a weapon spread (not including the blundergats line) Double Tap 2 can be obtained without Vanilla Expanded Framework installed.
